scripts.dev: export FRONTEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js frontend) && export BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) && concurrently "cargo watch -w backend -x 'run --manifest-path backend/Cargo.toml'" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.build: npm run frontend:build && cargo build --release --manifest-path backend/Cargo.toml && cargo build --release --bin mcp_task_server --manifest-path backend/Cargo.toml
scripts.build:single: npm run frontend:build && cargo build --release --manifest-path backend/Cargo.toml
scripts.backend:dev: BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) cargo watch -w backend -x 'run --manifest-path backend/Cargo.toml'
